lib-changelogs.settings.alwaysShow.name: DEBUG: Always show all changelogs
lib-changelogs.settings.alwaysShow.hint: Always show all changelogs ignoring other settings
lib-changelogs.settings.warnLevel.name: Changelog Filter
lib-changelogs.settings.warnLevel.hint: Chose which level of filtering to use for changelogs to show only the ones of a certain importance
